Functions
(static)initUnit

Call it on server.  It initializes intel on some unit

Parameters: _unit

_unit

Unit object

Returns: nil

(static)updateUnit

NOT USED RIGHT NOW Call it on server.  It keeps intel inventory items of some unit up to date

Parameters: _unit

_unit

Unit object

Returns: nil

unitHasInventoryItem

Call it on server.  Returns true if the unit has an intel inventory item

Parameters: _unit

_unit

Unit object

Returns: bool

(static)initPlayer

Call it on player's computer when he respawns to to add actions to player to take intel items

player's object
